item.title: Home lab updates
item.description: Following up from my “Starting out with a home lab” article I’ve made some pretty nice updates to my home lab setup, and I’ve also got my {Ansible playbooks](https://github.com/maclarel/ansible_playbooks) up on GitHub now! Starting out with the lab additions: Gigabit internet (Cable, unfortunately) recently became available here, so I’ve now got a 1000/30 connection! Upload speeds are depressing, but still 3x the speed I had previously! UniFi Dream Machine has taken over my network.
